tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: As you may have noticed, the layers that were added match the Bot Products under the Masters Data Mine Products node.

paragraphs.text: Take a few minutes and check between the Bot Products nodes and your Layers. They Match!
To keep things simple, I have trimmed down the indicators held within each Data Mine. When you install the Masters Data Mine on your own you will have access to many more indicators!
